text: Sławomir Zawada is a Polish weightlifter. He won a Bronze medal in the 90 kg class at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul. == References == Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic weightlifters of Poland Category:Weightlifters at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Poland Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Medalists at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Więcbork Category:Polish male weightlifters
title: Sławomir Zawada
